Mayor and City Council

The City of Woodburn is a Council-Manager form of government operating pursuant to a City Charter.

This type of government consists of:

  • An elected Mayor

  • An elected City Council

  • A City Administrator, who is appointed by the Council 

The City Council sets policy for the City of Woodburn and the City Administrator and staff are responsible for carrying out that policy. Refer to the City Organizational Chart for more information on City structure.

View the Council Ward Map by clicking here.
